climbs.name: Tentadora
climbs.fa: Unknown, no FA heard of yet...

content.description: Cruise up the middle of the boulder.
content.protection: One bolt at the apex of the boulder marking the route.
content.location: This is on Charm Boulder...follow the trail on the backside of Bullet Hole Boulder up the hill about 40 yards. About 30 degrees overhanging, the route starts in the middle of the gentle dihedral. You can't miss it!

content.description:
This is a fun line... it is a little chossy, but nevertheless the holds are firm and solid. Bring a brush!!!

Sit start low about 10-15 feet to the right of

Tentadora

. Pull up into a deep pinch and pull a series of layback moves up and into a big, shallow hueco.

It has a scary topout, bring pads and a good spotter!
content.location:
This is on Charm Boulder...follow the trail on the backside of Bullet Hole Boulder up the hill about 40 yards. Start on the right side of the boulder and follow the obvious line up and left to the apex of the boulder topping out where

Tentadora

does. You can't miss it!!
